results.name: Order of complex Clifford group of degree 2^n arising in quantum coding theory.
reference: B. Runge, Codes and Siegel modular forms, Discrete Math. 148 (1996), 175-204.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20
A. R. Calderbank, E. M. Rains, P. W. Shor and N. J. A. Sloane, Quantum error correction via codes over GF(4), IEEE Trans. Inform. Theory, 44 (1998), 1369-1387.
G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The invariants of the Clifford groups, Des. Codes Crypt. 24 (2001), 99-121.
G. Nebe, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, Self-Dual Codes and Invariant Theory, Springer, Berlin, 2006.
Tefjol Pllaha, Olav Tirkkonen, Robert Calderbank, Binary Subspace Chirps, arXiv:2102.12384 [cs.IT], 2021.
Index entries for sequences related to groups
maple: a(n):= 2^(n^2+2*n+3)*mul(4^j-1, j=1..n); seq(a(n), n=0..10); # modified by _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 24 2019
program: (MAGMA) [n eq 0 select 8 else 2^((n+1)^2+2)*(&*[4^j-1: j in [1..n]]): n in [0..10]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 24 2019
(Sage) [2^((n+1)^2 +2)*product(4^j -1 for j in (1..n)) for n in (0..10)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 24 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Peter Shor_
